scripts.preview: OUTPUT_EXPORT=1 node scripts/syncUploads.mjs && OUTPUT_EXPORT=1 next build && python3 -m http.server 3011 --directory out
scripts.preview:pages: OUTPUT_EXPORT=1 node scripts/syncUploads.mjs && OUTPUT_EXPORT=1 next build && pnpm exec wrangler pages dev out --compatibility-flag=nodejs_compat --port 3011
